meanings.definition: Conveyed through a duct or ducts.
meanings.sent1: The cool air in the house was ducted through the vents.
meanings.sent2: The ducted system efficiently circulated the heat throughout the building.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special suit was ducted to channel their powers effectively.
meanings.sent4: The information was ducted discreetly to the right recipients.
meanings.sent5: The water was ducted underground to reach every corner of the garden.

meanings.definition: Furnished with a duct or ducts.
meanings.sent1: The ducted ceiling provided excellent ventilation in the room.
meanings.sent2: The ducted walls allowed for easy maintenance of the building's utilities.
meanings.sent3: The ducted car had a unique design that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: The ducted ship efficiently directed airflow for optimal performance.
meanings.sent5: The ducted aircraft had a sleek design for streamlined airflow.
